text: Ara tadera madhye ekadala rayeche, yara bikrta uccarane mukha bamkiye kitaba patha kare, yate tomara mane kara ye, tara kitaba theke'i patha karache. Athaca tara ya abrtti karache ta adau kitaba naya. Ebam tara bale ye, esaba katha allahara tarapha theke agata. Athaca esaba allahara tarapha theke prerita naya. Tara bale ye, eti allahara katha athaca esaba allahara katha naya. Ara tara jene sune allahara'i prati mithyaropa kare.
